DOC.brief_summary: Children born less than 1500 grams are being enrolled into a study to test the effectiveness of a parental educational intervention in reducing the risk of future breathing problems. The intervention teaches parents of these children how to reduce the risk of / and recognize breathing problems.
DOC.brief_title: Improving Asthma Care for Very Low Birth Weight Infants
DOC.criteria: Premature babies weighing less than 1500 grams at birth receiving care at Strong Memorial Hospital Neonatal Intensive Care Unit NonEnglish speaking parents
